name: Entanglement (itch) (Gal Balshai, orsme, Carmel.Lavon, hala.omari)
description:
Entanglement In the early spring, the plants occupying a lovely greenhouse wage their war. Blocking and blowing up their opponents, the plants try to remain the longest, most numerous plant on the board, and absorb the most Sunlight. The Battle for Sunlight begins! Instructions:

Use the Arrow Keys to grow your plant.

When a Flower Bomb spawns on your plant, click on it with the Left Mouse Button to trigger an Explosion, blowing up all enemy tiles within a certain radius.

If you accidentally place a segment and It's still your turn - Don't worry! Pressing Backspace will remove unwanted segments that were placed in the current turn!

The player with most segments still remaining will be the winner!

A Student Project of Bezalel, Academy of Art and Design, and The Hebrew University of Jerusalem. The Students: Graphics

Carmel Lavon, Gal Balshai

Programming

Or Smeczechowski, Hala Omari
